name: Craft iron pickaxe
goal: Craft an iron pickaxe from iron ingots and sticks using a crafting table
notes: The iron pickaxe is required to mine gold ore, diamond ore, emerald ore, and redstone ore. It has 250 durability and mines faster than stone. Iron ingots come from smelting iron ore or raw iron in a furnace. See 'Gather iron ingot' recipe for all ways to obtain iron ingots. Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain iron ingots
steps.details: You need 3 iron ingots. Smelt raw iron or iron ore in a furnace (1 ore -> 1 ingot). You can also break down an iron block (1 block -> 9 ingots) or craft 9 iron nuggets into 1 ingot. See the 'Gather iron ingot' recipe for full details.
checks: Have at least 3 iron_ingot in inventory

steps.title: Obtain sticks
steps.details: You need 2 sticks. Craft from 2 planks (yields 4 sticks). Skip if you already have sticks.
checks: Have at least 2 sticks in inventory

steps.title: Craft the iron pickaxe
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 3 iron ingots across the top row, 1 stick in middle-center, 1 stick in bottom-center. Recipe: { "recipe": "iron_pickaxe", "count": 1 }. The iron pickaxe has 250 durability and can mine diamond and gold ore.
